hanzi-su-wiki:
迎

Значения

Выходить навстречу, приглашать

Мнемоника

Идти 辶 навстречу гостю, широко распахнув ворота 卯 дома.
purpleculture_pinyin:
yíng
to welcome; to meet; to face; to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties)
приветствовать; встречаться; к лицу; продвигаться вперед (особенно перед лицом трудностей)
rtega_mnemonic:
迎迎RSreceive, welcome, greet
  • go ⻌ and meet somebody with lofty 卬 words
purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 送
Pictophonetic: 卬 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
欢迎 [ huān yíng ]: to welcome; welcome
迎接 [ yíng jiē ]: to meet; to welcome; to greet
迎面 [ yíng miàn ]: directly; head-on (collision); in one's face (of wind)
迎战 [ yíng zhàn ]: to meet the enemy head-on
迎合 [ yíng hé ]: to cater to; to pander to

heisig_constituent: welcome, stamp album, box, stamps, road
koohiiStory1: Welcome home daddy! Is that box for me? You were on the road a long time! I collected all the stamps from the letters you wrote me　:-) ...　　RTK2:　ゲイ　歓迎　かんげい(welcome).
koohiiStory2: Stamp-collectors sit and wait on the road to welcome new mail arrivals.
jp_example_words:

出迎え(でむかえ): meeting, reception
出迎える(でむかえる): to meet, to greet

WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: In its scooter, a cat pirate scoots up to welcome you!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: "Nya! Welcome to my ship, grab a scooter and scoot on up here, we're about to start the welcome ceremonya!"
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The cat pirate then launches into a speech about how they welcome all kinds of people. Especially gay (げい) people. He puts a certain emphasis on gay, so you figure that the cat pirate either thinks you're gay or wants you to be.
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
You're really happy this cat pirate welcomes gay people aboard. Whether that's because you're gay or just because you're a baseline decent human being is up to you.
Also if you aren't the kind of person who would welcome gay people onto your cat pirate ship, you should just leave nyaow.
Ru_trainchinese: yíng: (глаг) приветствовать, встречать; стоять лицом к
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if it's high-priced (卬) you'd move (⻌) to meet it
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Stamp collectors sit and wait on the road to greet new mail arrivals.
humanum_full_description_en:
" Welcome " originally refers to meet and meet, and it is extended to welcome, and the ancient word " inverse ". "Shuowen": "Feng Ye. From the sound of the 卬卬." Duan Yucai's note: "When you meet, you have the same reason." "Dialect": "Feng, Ni, Ying Ye. From Guan and Dong said Ni From the Guanxi to the west may be called Ying, or Feng."

It means to welcome and face. "Mawangdui. "Lao Zi Yi Ben": "Sui (following) without seeing the following, welcome and without seeing the head.

In addition, every " welcome " is the opposite of the direction of the object, so it also means the opposite and the opposite, which is the same as " inverse ". "Mozi. "Lu Wen": "In the past, the people of Chu followed the current and retreated."
humanum_short_description_en: " Welcome " originally refers to meet and meet, and is extended to welcome, and the ancient word " inverse ".
humanum_full_description:
「迎」本指相遇、相逢，引申為迎接，古作「逆」。《說文》：「逢也。从辵卬聲。」段玉裁注：「逢，遇也，其理一也。」《方言》：「逢、逆，迎也。自關而東曰逆，自關而西或曰迎，或曰逢。」

　　表示迎接、面向。《馬王堆．老子乙本》：「隋(隨)而不見其後，迎而不見其首。」

　　此外，凡「迎」皆與所迎向之物方向相反，故又表示相反、反向，與「逆」同。《墨子．魯問》：「昔者，楚人順流而進，迎流而退」。
humanum_short_description: 「迎」本指相遇、相逢，引申為迎接，古作「逆」。

Pinyin: yíng
English Definition: to welcome; to meet; to face; to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties)
Antonyms: 送
Total strokes: 8; Radical: 辵
Pictophonetic: 卬 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 卬 [ áng ] lofty; high; to raise; high-priced, expensive

「 迎 」本指相遇、相逢，引申為迎接，古作「 逆 」。《說文》：「逢也。从辵卬聲。」段玉裁注：「逢，遇也，其理一也。」《方言》：「逢、逆，迎也。自關而東曰逆，自關而西或曰迎，或曰逢。」 表示迎接、面向。《馬王堆．老子乙本》：「隋(隨)而不見其後，迎而不見其首。」 此外，凡「 迎 」皆與所迎向之物方向相反，故又表示相反、反向，與「 逆 」同。《墨子．魯問》：「昔者，楚人順流而進，迎流而退」。
" Welcome" originally refers to meet and meet, and it is extended to welcome, and the ancient word " inverse". "Shuowen": "Feng Ye. From the sound of the 卬卬." Duan Yucai's note: "When you meet, you have the same reason." "Dialect": "Feng, Ni, Ying Ye. From Guan and Dong said Ni From the Guanxi to the west may be called Ying, or Feng." It means to welcome and face. "Mawangdui. "Lao Zi Yi Ben": "Sui (following) without seeing the following, welcome and without seeing the head. In addition, every " welcome" is the opposite of the direction of the object, so it also means the opposite and the opposite, which is the same as " inverse". "Mozi. "Lu Wen": "In the past, the people of Chu followed the current and retreated."

迎字的基本解释

迎
yíng
接：迎接。欢迎。迎宾。迎候。
面对着，冲着：迎面。迎风（ａ．对着风；ｂ．随风）。迎刃而解（ji?）。
揣度别人心意而投其所好：逢迎。迎合。
送

迎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yíng］
［《廣韻》語京切，平庚，疑。］
(1)迎接。
(2)荐举；选用。
(3)迎合，逢迎。
(4)迎击；抵御。
(5)面向着；正对着。
(6)遇，遭逢。
(7)逆，反向。
(8)预测；推算。参见“迎日推筴”。
[②]［yìng］
［《廣韻》魚敬切，去映，疑。］
往迎。常特指迎亲。

迎字的英文翻译

◎ 迎
meet, greet, welcome, move towards

迎字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　迎； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1254第03
【唐韻】語京切【集韻】魚京切【韻會】疑京切，?音?。【說文】逢也。【增韻】逆也，迓也。【揚子·方言】自關而東曰逆，自關而西曰迎。【淮南子·覽㝠訓】不將不迎。【註】將，送也。迎，接也。不隨物而往，不先物而動也。　又逆數也。【史記·五帝紀】迎日推策。【註】逆數之也。日月朔望，未來而推之，故曰迎日。　又【廣韻】魚敬切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】魚慶切，??去聲。【正韻】凡物來而接之則平聲，物未來而往迓之則去聲。【詩·大雅】親迎于渭。　又叶吾郞切，音昂。【史記·龜筴傳】理達于理，文相錯迎。使工占之，所言盡當。　又叶元具切，音遇。【屈原·離騷】百神翳其備降兮，九嶷?其?迎。皇剡剡其揚靈兮，告余以吉故。

考證：〔【史記·龜筴傳】理達于理，文相錯迎。使工召之，所言盡當。〕　謹照原文召之改占之。
迎字的源字形

迎字的起名意思

：遇、相逢，迎接，热情接待，也指向着，对着。揣度别人心意而投其所好。

welcome

Faced, directed: head on. Facing the wind (a. Facing the wind; b. Following the wind). Solved easily (ji?).
Calculate the minds of others and do what they like: greet. cater.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yíng］
["Guang Yun" Yu Jingqie, Ping Geng, doubt. ]
(1) Welcome.
(2) Recommendation; selection.
(3) To cater to, to greet.
(4) To meet; to resist.
(5) Facing; facing right.
(6) Encounter, encounter.
(7) Reverse, reverse.
(8) Forecast; calculation. See "Welcome to the Sun".
[②]［yìng］
["Guangyun" fish respectfully cut, go to film, doubt. ]
To welcome. Often refers specifically to welcoming relatives.
welcome

[Tang Yun] Yu Jing cut [Ji Yun] Yu Jing cut [Yun Hui] Doubt Jing cut, "yin?". [Said Wen] Every time. [Zeng Yun] Ni Ye, Ye Ye. 【Yangtze Dialect】From Guan to the east, it is “inverse”, and from Guan to the west, it is “welcoming”. [Huainanzi·Lan 㝠 Xun] will not be welcome. [Note] Will, give it away. Welcome, pick up. Don’t go with things, don’t move with things first.　It's the inverse number again. 【Historical Records·Five Emperors】Push policy to welcome the sun. [Note] The inverse number is also. The sun and the moon look forward to the future, so it is called welcoming the sun.　 [Guang Yun] Yu Jing cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Yu Qing cut,?? Go sound. [Zheng Yun] When everything comes, it will sound flat, and when things go in the future, they will go. 【Poetry·Daya】Welcome to Wei.　Ye Wu hasn't cut, the sound is loud. 【Historical Records·Kui Jie Biography】The literary comprehension meets the mistakes of reasoning. Let the work take up, and do what you say.　Ye Yuan Gu Qi again, Yin Yu. [Qu Yuan·Lisao] Hundreds of gods will prepare for their surrender, and Jiuyi will welcome them. The Emperor Yan said his spirits, and told the rest for good fortune. iinkiiztfnki Zhongguanguan
yíng
1) встречать; привечать, приветствовать
出迎 выходить встречать
迎宾 встречать (принимать) гостей
2) направляться навстречу, идти навстречу; встречный
迎着队伍走 двигаться навстречу войску
迎流 навстречу течению, против течения
3) встречать праздник; устраивать праздник в честь (чего-л)
迎夏 встречать летний сезон
迎气 встречать сезон года
迎神 устраивать праздник в честь божества
4) * вычислять, выбирать
迎日 вычислять счастливые дни, выбирать благоприятное число месяца
Radicals: 卬  (cat-pirate, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
In its scooter, a cat pirate scoots up to welcome you!
"Nya! Welcome to my ship, grab a scooter and scoot on up here, we're about to start the welcome ceremonya!"
Reading Mnemonic
The cat pirate then launches into a speech about how they welcome all kinds of people. Especially gay (げい) people. He puts a certain emphasis on gay, so you figure that the cat pirate either thinks you're gay or wants you to be.
You're really happy this cat pirate welcomes gay people aboard. Whether that's because you're gay or just because you're a baseline decent human being is up to you.
Also if you aren't the kind of person who would welcome gay people onto your cat pirate ship, you should just leave nyaow.
